    • Method Detail

      • listContainers

        public java.util.List<com.github.dockerjava.api.model.Container> listContainers(java.lang.String name,
                                                                                java.lang.String id,
                                                                                java.lang.String volume,
                                                                                java.lang.String network,
                                                                                java.lang.Boolean showAll)
        List containers, filtered with the given filters, if any.
        /!\ If you don't want to use a param marked as optional, simply pass null.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the container (optional).
        id - The id of the container (optional).
        volume - The volume of the container (optional).
        network - The network of the container (optional).
        showAll - Show all containers (optional).
        Returns:
        The list of containers.

      • listContainers

        public java.util.List<com.github.dockerjava.api.model.Container> listContainers(java.lang.String beforeId,
                                                                                java.lang.String name,
                                                                                java.lang.String id,
                                                                                java.lang.String ancestor,
                                                                                java.lang.String volume,
                                                                                java.lang.String network,
                                                                                java.lang.Integer exitCode,
                                                                                java.lang.String label,
                                                                                java.lang.String since,
                                                                                java.lang.Boolean showSize,
                                                                                java.lang.Boolean showAll,
                                                                                java.lang.Integer limit)
        List containers, filtered with the given filters, if any.
        /!\ If you don't want to use a param marked as optional, simply pass null.
        Parameters:
        beforeId - All containers created before this container id (optional).
        name - All containers with this name (optional).
        id - All containers with this id (optional).
        ancestor - Containers created by this image or its parents (optional).
        volume - All containers with this volume (optional).
        network - All containers with this network (optional).
        exitCode - All containers with this exit code (optional).
        label - All containers with this label (optional).
        since - All containers created after this container id (optional).
        showSize - Show the size of the container (optional).
        showAll - Show all containers (optional).
        limit - Limit the number of containers returned (optional).
        Returns:
        The list of containers.

      • createContainer

        public com.github.dockerjava.api.command.CreateContainerResponse createContainer(@NotNull
                                                                                 @NotNull java.lang.String image,
                                                                                 java.lang.String name,
                                                                                 java.util.List<java.lang.String> env)
        Create a container, without starting it.
        /!\ If you don't want to use a param marked as optional, simply pass null.
        Parameters:
        image - The image to use.
        name - The name of the container (optional).
        env - The environment variables to set in the container (optional).
        Returns:
        The created container.

      • createContainer

        public com.github.dockerjava.api.command.CreateContainerResponse createContainer(@NotNull
                                                                                 @NotNull java.lang.String image,
                                                                                 java.lang.String name,
                                                                                 java.lang.String command,
                                                                                 java.util.List<com.github.dockerjava.api.model.Volume> volumes,
                                                                                 java.util.List<java.lang.String> env,
                                                                                 com.github.dockerjava.api.model.HostConfig config)
        Create a container, without starting it.
        /!\ If you don't want to use a param marked as optional, simply pass null.
        Parameters:
        image - The image to use.
        name - The name of the container (optional).
        command - The command to execute in the container (optional).
        volumes - The volumes to mount in the container (optional).
        env - The environment variables to set in the container (optional).
        config - The configuration to use for the container, like ports binding or material resources (optional).
        Returns:
        The created container.

        env - The environment variables to set in the container (optional).

      • copyFromContainer

        public java.io.InputStream copyFromContainer(@NotNull
                                             @NotNull java.lang.String containerId,
                                             @NotNull
                                             @NotNull java.lang.String resourcePath,
                                             @NotNull
                                             @NotNull java.lang.String destination)
        Copy a file from a container to the host.
        /!\ Warning: Don't forget to close the stream after usage to avoid memory leaks.
        Parameters:
        containerId - The id of the container to copy from.
        resourcePath - The path of the resource to copy.
        destination - The destination to copy the resource to.
        Returns:
        The stream to read the resource.

      • copyToContainer

        public void copyToContainer(@NotNull
                            @NotNull java.lang.String containerId,
                            @NotNull
                            @NotNull java.lang.String resourcePath,
                            @NotNull
                            @NotNull java.lang.String destination,
                            java.lang.Boolean noOverwriteDirNonDir,
                            java.lang.Boolean dirChildrenOnly)
        Copy a file from the host to a container.
        /!\ If you don't want to use a param marked as optional, simply pass null.
        Parameters:
        containerId - The id of the container to copy to.
        resourcePath - The path of the resource to copy.
        destination - The destination to copy the resource to.
        noOverwriteDirNonDir - true to prevent overwriting of directory names with files when copying, and vice versa (optional).
        dirChildrenOnly - true to copy only the directory's children, and not the directory itself (optional).

      • getContainerDiff

        Get files and directories changes from a container.
        Parameters:
        containerId - The id of the container to get changes from.
        Returns:
        The changes.

      • stopContainer

        public void stopContainer(@NotNull
                          @NotNull java.lang.String containerId,
                          java.lang.Integer timeout)
        Properly stop a container.
        /!\ If you don't want to use a param marked as optional, simply pass null.
        Parameters:
        containerId - The id of the container to stop.
        timeout - The timeout to wait for the container to stop (optional).

      • removeContainer

        public void removeContainer(@NotNull
                            @NotNull java.lang.String containerId,
                            java.lang.Boolean removeVolumes,
                            java.lang.Boolean force)
        Remove a previously stopped container.
        Parameters:
        containerId - The id of the container to remove.
        removeVolumes - true to remove the volumes associated with the container, false otherwise (optional).
        force - true to force the removal of a running container, false otherwise (optional).

      • killContainer

        public void killContainer(@NotNull
                          @NotNull java.lang.String containerId,
                          java.lang.String signal)
        Force stops a container.
        /!\ If you don't want to use a param marked as optional, simply pass null.
        Parameters:
        containerId - The id of the container to stop.
        signal - The signal to send to the container (optional).
